PlaceholderDesc_ValueObject: Objekt to which the chosen value belongs
PlaceholderDesc_SelectedField: Selected field that will be used for the comparison
PlaceholderDesc_IsOperatorPrimitive: true if the operator is a primitive operator (=, !=, <, <=, ...), else false
PlaceholderDesc_Operator: Operator for the comparison. Will be loaded using the corresponding templates.
PlaceholderDesc_OriginalOperator: Original operator for the comparison. This one will not be loaded from the templates, but will always have the value selected in the condition dropdown.
